High PageRank but low partner returns suggests influence not translating to revenue — contrarian. SUGGESTION1: pv13_com_page_rank + rel_ret_part used. SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage OK. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence 0.63.

Sum zscores of rel_ret_comp and rel_ret_all to detect systemic stress. SUGGESTION1: applied. SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence 0.67.
